extDescription.message: Detects and highlights different Dark Patterns on websites.

errorInvalidConfig.message: The internal pattern configuration of the extension is invalid. The pattern highlighter will not start.
errorInvalidConfig.description: The error message in case of an invalid internal pattern configuration.

buttonOnState.description: The message when the switch is turned on in the popup.

buttonOffState.description: The message when the switch is turned off in the popup.

buttonReloadPageForChange.description: Text for the button to reload the page after a changed activation state.

buttonRedoPatternCheck.description: Text for the button to repeat the pattern highlighting on the page.

headingShowPattern.description: Heading in the popup for the buttons to show individual pattern elements.

headingFoundPatterns.description: Heading in the popup for the list of found patterns.

headingSupportedPatterns.description: Heading in the popup for the list of supported patterns.

textMoreInformation.description: Text in the footer preceding the link to the Wikipedia website.

feedbackMoreInformation.message: You can report your issues here
feedbackMoreInformation.description: Text in the footer preceding the link to the form submission website.

infoExtensionStarted.description: Message in the console when the pattern highlighter was started on a page.

infoExtensionDisabled.message: Pattern Highlighter is disabled for this tab.
infoExtensionDisabled.description: Message in the console when the pattern highlighter is disabled in a tab.

infoNumberPatternsFound.description: Message in the console about how many patterns were detected.

patternCountdown_infoUrl.description: URL to the explanation of the countdown pattern on the dapde.de website.

patternCountdown_info.message: False Urgency patterns induce (truthfully or falsely) the impression that a product or service is only available for a certain period of time. This is illustrated through a running clock or a lapsing bar. You can watch as the desired good slips away.
patternCountdown_info.description: Brief explanation of the countdown Pattern.

patternScarcity_infoUrl.description: URL to the explanation of the scarcity pattern on the dapde.de website.

patternScarcity_info.message: The Scarcity Pattern induces (truthfully or falsely) the impression that goods or services are only available in limited numbers. Scarcity Patterns are also used in versions where the alleged scarcity is simply invented or where it is not made clear whether the limited availability relates to the product as a whole or only to the contingent of the portal visited.
patternScarcity_info.description: Brief explanation of the scarcity Pattern.

patternSocialProof_name.description: Name of the social proof pattern.

patternSocialProof_infoUrl.description: URL to the explanation of the social proof pattern on the dapde.de website.

patternSocialProof_info.message: Social Proof is another Dark Pattern of this category. Positive product reviews or activity reports from other users are displayed directly. Often, these reviews or reports are simply made up. But authentic reviews or reports also influence the purchase decision through smart selection and placement.
patternSocialProof_info.description: Brief explanation of the social proof Pattern.

patternForcedContinuity_name.description: Name of the forced continuity pattern.

patternForcedContinuity_infoUrl.description: URL to the explanation of the forced continuity pattern on the dapde.de website.

patternForcedContinuity_info.message: Hidden costs dark pattern involves deliberately obscuring additional fees or charges associated with a product or service to deceive and manipulate users into making a purchase without fully understanding the true financial implications.
patternForcedContinuity_info.description: Brief explanation of the forced continuity Pattern.

patternBasketSneaking_name.description: Name of the forced continuity pattern.

patternBasketSneaking_infoUrl.description: URL to the explanation of the forced continuity pattern on the dapde.de website.

patternBasketSneaking_info.message: Basket sneaking dark pattern involves subtly adding extra items to a user's online shopping cart without their explicit consent or clear notification, aiming to increase the purchase amount and potentially deceive the customer into unintended or unwanted transactions
patternBasketSneaking_info.description: Brief explanation of the forced continuity Pattern.

showPatternState.description: Display the number of the current pattern in the popup for the 'Show patterns' function.
